mapper.select: select N.*, F.FNUM,F.FNAME,F.ONAME FROM NOTICE N FULL OUTER JOIN NOTICEFILES F ON N.NUM = F.NUM WHERE N.NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert:
select board_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice values (#{num},#{title},#{writer},#{contents},sysdate,0)
mapper.select:
select count(num) from notice
where title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where contents like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%'

select * from (select N.*, rownum R from (select * from notice
where title like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where contents like '%'||#{search}||'%'
where writer like '%'||#{search}||'%'
order by num desc ) N) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
